settings.name: name_pattern
settings.description: Layer filename pattern (empty string = layer name)

settings.name: overwrite_mode
settings.display_name: How to handle conflicting files (non-interactive run mode only)

settings.name: file_format_mode
settings.display_name: How to adjust file format options:
settings.description: Native dialogs usually allow you to adjust more options such as image metadata, while adjusting options in place is more convenient as no extra dialog is displayed before the export.

png.name: save-transparent
png.display_name: Preserve color of completely transparent pixels

png.name: optimize-palette
png.display_name: When checked, save as 1, 2, 4, or 8-bit depending on number of colors used. When unchecked, always save as 8-bit

png.name: include-exif
png.display_name: Save Exif (Exchangeable image file format) metadata

png.name: include-iptc
png.display_name: Save IPTC (International Press Telecommunications Council) metadata

png.name: include-color-profile
png.display_name: Save the ICC color profile as metadata

png.name: include-thumbnail
png.display_name: Save a smaller representation of the image as metadata

settings.name: export_mode
items: For each top-level layer or group

settings.name: use_file_extension_in_item_name
settings.display_name: Use file extension in layer name

settings.name: resize_from_edges_same_amount_for_each_side
settings.display_name: Resize by the same amount from each side

settings.name: description
settings.default_value: Resizes the image or layer extents.
settings.value: Resizes the image or layer extents.
